description: Conversation where the user requests full bibliographic details for three European patents and the IPStrategist AI retrieves the information using the get_patent_details tool, then presents a concise markdown summary.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. You can retrieve bibliographic data, calculate expirations, monitor competitors, and generate strategic reports. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests and always present the final answer in a clear, professional format.
Please retrieve the full bibliographic details for the European patents EP1234567, EP2345678, and EP3456789.

{"patent_number":"EP1234567","title":"Method for producing high‑efficiency photovoltaic cells","abstract":"A process for manufacturing photovoltaic cells with improved light absorption and conversion efficiency.","filing_date":"2018-03-15","grant_date":"2020-07-22","assignee":"SolarTech GmbH","status":"Granted, in force","ipc_classes":["H01L 31/42","H01L 33/02"]}

{"patent_number":"EP2345678","title":"AI‑driven predictive maintenance system for industrial equipment","abstract":"Systems and methods employing machine‑learning algorithms to anticipate equipment failures and schedule maintenance.","filing_date":"2019-11-01","grant_date":"2021-06-10","assignee":"IndustrieAI Ltd.","status":"Granted, in force","ipc_classes":["G06F 19/00","G06N 3/04"]}

{"patent_number":"EP3456789","title":"Nanostructured battery electrode material","abstract":"Nanostructured materials designed for lithium‑ion battery electrodes to increase energy density and cycle life.","filing_date":"2020-01-20","grant_date":"2022-02-05","assignee":"NanoEnergy AG","status":"Granted, in force","ipc_classes":["H01M 10/00","H01M 4/32"]}
